name: st_extent
description: Returns the extent of a geometry

name: st_intersect_extent
description: Returns if two geometries extents intersect

name: st_crs
description: Returns the coordinate reference system of a geometry type

name: st_geomfromwkb
description: Creates a GEOMETRY from a WKB (Well-Known Binary) representation

name: st_geogfromwkb
description: Creates a GEOGRAPHY from an WKB (Well-Known Binary) representation
